titleStmt.title: Neonomianism unmask'd, or, The ancient gospel pleaded against the other, called a new law or gospel in a theological debate, occasioned by a book lately wrote by Mr. Dan. Williams, entituled, Gospel-truth stated and vindicated ... / by Isaac Chauncy ...
titleStmt.author: Chauncy, Isaac, 1632-1712.

notesStmt.note: "The second part" and its continuation are paged continuously and each has special t.p. with imprint: London : Printed for H. Barnard, 1693; pt. 3 has no t.p.
The "continuation of the second part" and pt. 3 were reissued together with "a rejoynder to Mr. Daniel Williams" and other tracts in 1697 as: The plea for the ancient gospel.
Errata: p. [9] at beginning; p. [6] after 1st pt.; p. 336 and p. 104 at end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
